Hey everyobody! check out Ihrenes music, indie&soul tale

I am starting to promote my music and love you all to come and listen, although I am still creating, composing and producing songs, so be patient.. also looking for a producer and manager, its basicaly impossible to do it ALL on my own!!

Right now I m talking to some people to see if we can produce a dance hit, so wish me luck!

more to come soon!!

Love,
Ihrenes.

Poetry by Ihrenes . "The Book of Love. A romantic Epic

The Book of Love
A Romantic Epic on the Escape of the Devastation of the Soul
by Ihrenes

Prelude to the Book of Love

The Book of Love was written long ago.
The Book of Love was written by someone,
Who wished Never to be alone.

The Book of love was written by The One.
At the beginning of Time.
Someone who despite All thought,
Who despite All wrote.
And thought and thought and wrote even more.

The Book of love was the original confession.
The first of All.
A sole conversation.

The Book of Love was the First monologue.
When the Only One looked around and felt the Void.

The Book of Love was written by the One
Who with his thousand eyes saw it All.
Who understood the meaning of things.
Who fought the emptiness on its own.
Who faced the Universe in its unique vastness.

The Book of Love was written despite
the surrounding void.

He then created Love.

Out of the song of Creation and interweed the texture of SpaceTime.

The book of Love is still being written by those who don’t who believe in Love.
(to be continued..)

Poetry by Ihrenes . "The Book of Love. A romantic Epic

Once upon a Time...
"The Stars missed the Earth
upon which they were meant to shine
onto endless Nights
of the purest skies
Blue and White
Silver and Dark
so pure was their Search
and so it would remain
until the very Time himself
STOPPED
and yet Then
It shall be timeless
As a photon which sits on top
of the nascent Universe
and starts it All over again.
Once more
in an Endless passionate Dance
forever More.
"I want more", they all once shouted
and the Sun gave them the Earth.
"I want more!!", they this time in unison cried
and the Skies gave them their glow.
"We don’t have enough !!", and the Universe gave
them your Eyes.
Then they stood
STILL
as if for all Time.
In the vastness of Space
Shining bright
as if contempt...
as if satisfied.
For there were no other eyes as precious as
yours."
Fragment from
"The Book Of Love” ,by Ihrenes.

Messy message trouble!!

Hey everybody!
I have been receiving lots of messages but somehow I don´t know whats the problem, the system does not allow me to view them nor access them!!! so I have no idea why this is happening.

Hope to be able to view them soon,
lots of love,
Ihrenes.

Something horrifying has just happened in Congo, please pray

I don`t know how human kind and God can possibly allow something so horrifying to take place.
Please pray for those women, and children.

SPAMM has INVADED MY ACCOUNT!!!

Hey friends,

I am getting a lot of messages from you and I bet they are very nice, BUT I CANNOT VIEW THEM BECUASE MY ACCOUNT HAS BECOME INVADED BY SPAMM!! so when I open a message insted of reading that which you wrote, there is this SPAM MESSAGE from some guy who is user in this system!!!

so the spam messages asking for our identies and such are in ALL the messages I receive.

Is this happeneing to you?
Love,
Ihrenes.

Irene will be interviewed live on TheSpaceShow, get tuned!!

Irene will be interviewed on THE SPACE SHOW to talk about the radiation that the PHOENIX MISSION has received during its 5 months on the MARTIAN POLES, get tunned!!

To listen, log on to:

www.thespaceshow.com

on the 19th Dec. @ 9:30 AM pacific time.
The interviews are also downloadable later on free of charge in case you have not been able to listen to it live.

On this radio show, diverse space personalities are featured and interviewed live for 2 hours and the public cna ask questions as they wish direclty to the speaker, via phone, e-mail and text messaging.This radio show is podcasted and webcasted all over the world and it is headquarted in Los Angeles, California, USA.

Come join me and lets talk about space!

Love,
Ihrenes.

IHRENES - THE POP SCIENTIST

EVERYBODY CHECK THIS OUT,

I just came across this blog which some people make about me and they call me THE POP SCIENTIST!!! thank you! DANKE! SHUKRIA!! its so great, the name and I just got to love it, specially cause the comments are so cute and funny, you blogers make my day!

so check it out at:

http://gilaroid.blogspot.com/2008/12/la-cientfica-pop-existe.html

and you guys, come visit my site and drop me some pop love.

Scientific kisses to you!
muah.

Stay tune this Friday the 19th !

Hi Everybody,
Stay tune for this Friday the 19th Dec! I will be speaking LIVE on the Space Show once more, and will comment on the fascinating NASA Phoenix Mission recently recently terminated due to loss of communication but which is still there. I will comment amazing results from this mission and the implications for Life on Mars!!
You can log on to the Space Show website, the show will take place live at 9:30 AM Pacific time since it broadcasts from Los Angeles, USA. See the schedule and the website announcement below. And if you cannot listen at that time, you can always download it for free at any time after that!
Thanks and hope to have you as listeners!!

goto

www.thespaceshow.com

Love,
Ihrenes.

Anybody wants a fabolous Private Jet??? read on

Hi all !,

I have just started to represent (helping my father) the worlds best
private jet company (and which manufactures as well other type of civilian and military planes).They are part of the Ferrari group. The jets are SEXY and beautifully designed and can also be custom decorated for the client, they are super fuel efficient as well as emission efficient (better than conventional ones in terms of global warming CO2 emissions). These are the absolute LATEST in jets!!
(We can also arrange for immaculate condition previously used jets).

If you or anybody you know is interested in one of the airplanes, Piaggio p180 Avanti II, please let me know and I we will provide all the specific information for your client.
my email address is:

Hugs,
Ihrenes.

LOoking for SPONSORS for my NASA space simulation!

Please let me know if you would like to help me find a sponsor for my participation in the NASA manned lunar base simulation for which i am the lonly european woman participating and which is very pionbeering and very cool. I will be posting information and updates on my teams progress as we go and also on media coverage.

if you know a company or individual who would like to sponsor me drop me an email.

Thanks and lots of love,
Ihrenes.
A kind of special space girl..
